H3.text: who talks for belle in beauty and the beast. Jodi Benson

A4.text: In 1991, she made her motion picture debut in Disney's Beauty and the Beast, in which she voiced the film's heroine, Belle.

A5.text: O'Hara was replaced by Julie Nathanson as the official voice of Belle in 2011, since her voice has aged over time.
